Comment 7: 
I believe the Linux kernel lets you write a new value to mmap_min_addr.  So the notion
of figuring out the minimum limit on all GNU/Linux systems seems hopeless anyhow.

I think the only question is whether we want to worry about programs that explicitly
mmap low address pages.  It's hard for me to worry about such programs.  They are risky
in any case.
